segments.text: Didn't you notice the roses everywhere ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hear it's Chinese Valentine's Day ! Don't you know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , God . I just forgot it . I should have brought roses for my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not too late . Go to buy some now .
segments.speaker: S2
